DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose evaluate circadian variation EEG use BIS ( bispectral index ) monitor ICU patient three different group : non-sedated , sedate sedated curarized . BIS monitor value SR ( suppression rate ) , SEF ( Spectral edge frequency ) , bispectral index EMG ( electromyography ) 24 hour admit patient except acute neurological disease .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Circadian Variation EEG Using BIS Monitor ICU Patients
DOC.criteria: Admitted ICU Over 18 year old Acute neurological disease
